gate.learning.learners
Class PostProcessing

java.lang.Object
  gate.learning.learners.PostProcessing

public class PostProcessing
extends Object

Post-processing the resutls from the classifiers for annotate text. Some specific post-processing procedure is used for improving the performance of chunk learning.

Constructor Summary
PostProcessing()
          Trivial constructor.
PostProcessing(float boundaryP, float entityP, float thresholdClassificaton)
          Constructor with the three probability thresholds.
 
Method Summary
 void postProcessingChunk(short stage, LabelsOfFV[] multiLabels, int numClasses, HashSet chunks, HashMap chunkLenHash)
          Post-processing the classification results fro chunk learning, by keeping the consistency of start and end tokens of the same label, using the length information of chunk from the training data, selecting the chunk with the maximal probability from the overlapped chunks.
 void postProcessingClassification(short stage, LabelsOfFV[] multiLabels, int[] selectedLabels, float[] valueLabels)
          Post-processing the results for the classification problem for the one vs all others method: select the label with the maximal probability which is bigger than the pre-defined threshold, for one instance.
 void voteForOneVSAnother(DataForLearning dataFVinDoc, int numClasses)
          Post-processing for the one vs another method, for the training data without the null label.
 void voteForOneVSAnotherNull(DataForLearning dataFVinDoc, int numClasses)
          Post-processing for the one vs another method, for the training data with null label.

Method Detail

postProcessingChunk

public void postProcessingChunk(short stage,
                                LabelsOfFV[] multiLabels,
                                int numClasses,
                                HashSet chunks,
                                HashMap chunkLenHash)
Post-processing the classification results fro chunk learning, by keeping the consistency of start and end tokens of the same label, using the length information of chunk from the training data, selecting the chunk with the maximal probability from the overlapped chunks.

postProcessingClassification

public void postProcessingClassification(short stage,
                                         LabelsOfFV[] multiLabels,
                                         int[] selectedLabels,
                                         float[] valueLabels)
Post-processing the results for the classification problem for the one vs all others method: select the label with the maximal probability which is bigger than the pre-defined threshold, for one instance.

voteForOneVSAnotherNull

                                    int numClasses)
Post-processing for the one vs another method, for the training data with null label.

voteForOneVSAnother

                                int numClasses)
Post-processing for the one vs another method, for the training data without the null label.
